data.1: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
data.2: ALL PRAISE BE to Allah, Lord of all the worlds,
data.4: King of the Day of Judgement.
data.5: You alone we worship, and to You alone turn for help.
data.6: Guide us (O Lord) to the path that is straight,
data.7: The path of those You have blessed, Not of those who have earned Your anger, nor those who have gone astray.
